text: Extremely Decent is a sketch comedy group from Los Angeles, California. They are known for their YouTube channel, where they post sketches and music videos. Popular uploads include The First Honest Cable Company, A Facebook Update in Real Life, and Gollum vs. Smeagol Rap Battle. The group is made up of Mikey Caro, Jon Eidson, Ian McQuown, Brendan Rice, and Nick Smith. ==References== == External links == * Category:Sketch comedy troupes Category:American comedy troupes Category:Organizations based in Los Angeles
title: Extremely Decent
